inclusion.criterion: Presentation to the Fistula Care Centre in Lilongwe for medical evaluation
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Ability to consent for study participation in Chichewa
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Willingness to undergo pelvic ultrasound for assessment of pelvic organs
inclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Current pregnancy or pregnancy within the past six weeks
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: The patient is a 34-year-old obese woman with weight concerns, sleep apnea, PCO and dissatisfaction with her body shape. She has a BMI of 41.5 and lab results show FBS: 98 mg/dl, TG: 150 mg/dl, Cholesterol: 180 mg/dl, LDL: 90 mg/dl, HDL: 35 mg/dl.
